unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, crucial for us farmers! Heard PMFBY payouts are slow in Bihar again. Rs. 20,000/acre loss last year near Patna due to floods. Hoping for better coverage this time around, especially with Onam coming. Need to celebrate with a decent harvest, and some biryani! Else, back to square one. Weather's unpredictable, like a Mumbai local train.
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, crucial for us farmers! Heard P M F B Y payouts are slow in Bihar again. Rupee twenty thousand per acre loss last year near Patna due to floods. Hoping for better coverage this time around, especially with Onam coming. Need to celebrate with a decent harvest, and some biryani! Else, back to square one. Weather's unpredictable, like a Mumbai local train.
